mapper.select: SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by category_main_serial)) AS ROWNUM , * FROM MK_CATEGORY_MAIN

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by category_sub_first_no, category_sub_serial)) AS ROWNUM, A.CATEGORY_MAIN_SERIAL, A.CATEGORY_MAIN_NAME, B.CATEGORY_SUB_SERIAL, B.CATEGORY_SUB_NAME FROM MK_CATEGORY_MAIN A JOIN MK_CATEGORY_SUB B ON A.CATEGORY_MAIN_SERIAL = B.CATEGORY_SUB_FIRST_NO;

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by A.CATEGORY_MAIN_SERIAL,A.CATEGORY_GOODS_SERIAL)) AS ROWNUM, B.CATEGORY_MAIN_NAME, B.CATEGORY_SUB_NAME, A.* FROM MK_CATEGORY_GOODS A JOIN ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM, A.*, B.* FROM MK_CATEGORY_MAIN A JOIN MK_CATEGORY_SUB B ON A.CATEGORY_MAIN_SERIAL = B.CATEGORY_SUB_FIRST_NO) B ON A.CATEGORY_SUB_SERIAL = B.CATEGORY_SUB_SERIAL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MK_GOODS_DETAIL( GOODS_DETAIL_SERIAL, CATEGORY_MAIN_SERIAL, CATEGORY_SUB_SERIAL, CATEGORY_GOODS_SERIAL ) VALUES ( DEFAULT, #{category_main_serial}, #{category_sub_serial}, (SELECT MAX(CATEGORY_GOODS_SERIAL) FROM MK_CATEGORY_GOODS) )
mapper.select: SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by A.CATEGORY_MAIN_SERIAL,A.CATEGORY_SUB_SERIAL)) AS ROWNUM, B.CATEGORY_MAIN_NAME, B.CATEGORY_SUB_NAME, A.* FROM MK_CATEGORY_GOODS A JOIN ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM, A.*, B.* FROM MK_CATEGORY_MAIN A JOIN MK_CATEGORY_SUB B ON A.CATEGORY_MAIN_SERIAL = B.CATEGORY_SUB_FIRST_NO) B ON A.CATEGORY_SUB_SERIAL = B.CATEGORY_SUB_SERIAL WHERE CATEGORY_GOODS_SERIAL = #{category_goods_serial}
mapper.update: UPDATE MK_CATEGORY_GOODS SET CATEGORY_GOODS_NAME = #{category_goods_name}, CATEGORY_GOODS_NAME_SUBTEXT = #{category_goods_name_subtext}, CATEGORY_GOODS_UNIT = #{category_goods_unit}, CATEGORY_GOODS_WEIGHT = #{category_goods_weight}, CATEGORY_GOODS_ORIGIN = #{category_goods_origin}, CATEGORY_GOODS_PACKAGING_TYPE = #{category_goods_packaging_type}, CATEGORY_GOODS_DELIVERY_TYPE = #{category_goods_delivery_type}, CATEGORY_GOODS_EXP_DATE = #{category_goods_exp_date}, CATEGORY_GOODS_INFO = #{category_goods_info}, CATEGORY_GOODS_REF = #{category_goods_ref}, CATEGORY_GOODS_ALLERGY = #{category_goods_allergy}, CATEGORY_GOODS_DETAIL_NAME1 = #{category_goods_detail_name1}, CATEGORY_GOODS_DETAIL_NAME2 = #{category_goods_detail_name2}, CATEGORY_GOODS_DETAIL_NAME_SUBTEXT = #{category_goods_detail_name_subtext}, CATEGORY_GOODS_IMAGE_THUMB = #{category_goods_image_thumb}, CATEGORY_GOODS_IMAGE_DETAIL_HEADER = #{category_goods_image_detail_header}, CATEGORY_GOODS_IMAGE_DETAIL_MAIN = #{category_goods_image_detail_main} WHERE CATEGORY_GOODS_SERIAL = #{category_goods_serial}
